content:
Goal
* Please clarify how the coordinate system works for this clash by specifying:
  • which corner has the coordinates of 0,0 and
  • the directions in which x- and y-coordinates increase.

Input
* Please format "Line 1", "Next [[height]] lines" and "Last lines" in <<bold>>.

* Please replace "digits" with "single-digit integers".

* Please add the word "integer" before "coordinates".

* Please change "Each coordinate is" to "Each cell's coordinates are".

* Please change "{{x,y}}" to "[[x]]{{,}}[[y]]".

Constraints
* Please remove the second constraint, as "[[cell cost]]" is not a defined variable name and the range need not be repeated (it's already specified in the Input section).

* Please change "2 coordinates" to "the coordinates of 2 cells".

* Please specify the maximum length of the path (in terms of the number of cells).

Stub generator
* Please change Line 2 to:
loop height loopline width cost:int

Cases
* The following pairs of test and validator expect identical outputs. Please revise them so that the cases remain similar but expect different outputs:
  • Simple Path (Test 1) and Basic Path (Validator 1)
  • Zigzag Path (Test 2) and Curved Path (Validator 2)

* The following cases include paths with non-adjacent cells, which violates the stated constraints. Please correct these cases:
  • Long Journey (Test 3)
  • Maximum Grid (Test 4)
  • Complex Route (Validator 4)

* Please add a new pair of cases where [[width]] > [[height]] and the path does not begin with 0,0.

* Please add a new pair of cases where [[width]] < [[height]] and the path does not begin with 0,0.

Thanks.

Hello! Thank you very much for your detailed feedback!!
I worked on it, I believe it should be about done now :)
